38 class SimpleEDPAttributes
39 {
40  public:

43  bool use_PublicationWriterANDSubscriptionReader;
45  bool use_PublicationReaderANDSubscriptionWriter;

53 
58 class PortParameters
59 {
60  public:
61  PortParameters()
62  {
63  portBase = 7400;
64  participantIDGain = 2;
65  domainIDGain = 250;
66  offsetd0 = 0;
67  offsetd1 = 10;
68  offsetd2 = 1;
69  offsetd3 = 11;
70  };
71  virtual ~PortParameters(){}
78  inline uint32_t getMulticastPort(uint32_t domainId)
79  {
80  return portBase+ domainIDGain * domainId+ offsetd0;
81  }
89  inline uint32_t getUnicastPort(uint32_t domainId,uint32_t RTPSParticipantID)
90  {
91  return portBase+ domainIDGain * domainId + offsetd1 + participantIDGain * RTPSParticipantID;
92  }
94  uint16_t portBase;
96  uint16_t domainIDGain;
98  uint16_t participantIDGain;
100  uint16_t offsetd0;
102  uint16_t offsetd1;
104  uint16_t offsetd2;
106  uint16_t offsetd3;
107 };
108 
113 class BuiltinAttributes{
114  public:
120  bool use_SIMPLE_RTPSParticipantDiscoveryProtocol;
121 
123  bool use_WriterLivelinessProtocol;
127  bool use_SIMPLE_EndpointDiscoveryProtocol;
132  bool use_STATIC_EndpointDiscoveryProtocol;
133 
137  uint32_t domainId;
139  Duration_t leaseDuration;
144  Duration_t leaseDuration_announcementperiod;
146  SimpleEDPAttributes m_simpleEDP;
148  LocatorList_t metatrafficUnicastLocatorList;
150  LocatorList_t metatrafficMulticastLocatorList;
152  LocatorList_t initialPeersList;
153 
154  BuiltinAttributes()
155  {
156  use_SIMPLE_RTPSParticipantDiscoveryProtocol = true;
157  use_SIMPLE_EndpointDiscoveryProtocol = true;
158  use_STATIC_EndpointDiscoveryProtocol = false;
159  m_staticEndpointXMLFilename = "";
160  domainId = 0;
161  leaseDuration.seconds = 500;
162  leaseDuration_announcementperiod.seconds = 250;
163  use_WriterLivelinessProtocol = true;
164 
165  };
166  virtual ~BuiltinAttributes(){};
171  const char* getStaticEndpointXMLFilename(){ return m_staticEndpointXMLFilename.c_str(); };
176  void setStaticEndpointXMLFilename(const char* str){ m_staticEndpointXMLFilename = std::string(str); };
177  private:
179  std::string m_staticEndpointXMLFilename;
180 };

188 class RTPSParticipantAttributes
189 {
190  public:
191 
192  RTPSParticipantAttributes()
193  {
194  defaultSendPort = 10040;
195  setName("RTPSParticipant");
196  sendSocketBufferSize = 65536;
197  listenSocketBufferSize = 65536;
198  use_IP4_to_send = true;
199  use_IP6_to_send = false;
200  participantID = -1;
201  useBuiltinTransports = true;
202  }
203 
204  virtual ~RTPSParticipantAttributes(){};
205 
210  LocatorList_t defaultUnicastLocatorList;
211 
216  LocatorList_t defaultMulticastLocatorList;
217 
223  LocatorList_t defaultOutLocatorList;
224 
229  uint32_t defaultSendPort;
231  uint32_t sendSocketBufferSize;
233  uint32_t listenSocketBufferSize;
235  BuiltinAttributes builtin;
237  PortParameters port;
239  std::vector<octet> userData;
241  int32_t participantID;
243  bool use_IP4_to_send;
245  bool use_IP6_to_send;
247  inline void setName(const char* nam){name = nam;}
249  inline const char* getName() const {return name.c_str();}
251  ThroughputControllerDescriptor throughputController;
253  std::vector<std::shared_ptr<TransportDescriptorInterface> > userTransports;
255  bool useBuiltinTransports;
256 
258  PropertyPolicy properties;
259 
260  private:
262  std::string name;
263 };
